en.noTextContent: Please enter any text on left to get a QRCode
en.genQrFailed: Failed to genrate QRCode, maybe caused by too much content, please try to shorten them
en.textPlhd: text / url / email address / phone number (Extra spaces will be removed)
en.vcardAddrPlhd: e.g. 10 Fifth Avenue, 888th floor. New York
en.vcardMenoPlhd: e.g. The guy in blue T-shirt

zh-cn.noTextContent: 在左侧输入内容后才能生成二维码
zh-cn.genQrFailed: 二维码生成失败, 可能内容过多导致, 请缩短内容后再试
zh-cn.textPlhd: 文本 / 网址 / 电子邮箱 / 手机号码 (多余的空格会被移除)
